LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_Wing.label: feathered wings
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_Wing.description: By creating wings that are powerful enough to keep one aloft, but small enough to not intrude upon daily life, we have created a way to rapidly increase our speed.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_Hand.label: tentacle cluster
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_Hand.description: Adding a small amount of manipulator tentacles on our backs can increase our ability to work.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_Muscle.label: musculature braces
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_Muscle.description: Adding extra bands of muscle, as well as supporting bone to connect to, allows the host to hit harder and carry more.
